attributes.action: order the closure of Heathrow airport for civil aviation purposes for both environmental and homeland security reasons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The closure of the world's busiest airport would be a very strong signal to the world that the UK government is prepared to take radical action to combat the threat of climate change.

Those of us who live in West London are totally fed up with the noise of aircraft damaging the quality of our private life at home.  

Finally, aircraft using Heathrow have to fly over central London and this flightpath would seem to bring with it real risk of a major terrorist outrage against the capital of England.
